rule.text: The contest will run for each month during 2020.
To enter the contest, participants must be logged in to the member's area and go to https://www.nakedsword.com/member-benefit-enter to enter their email address.

Email address will be cumulatively collected and put into a randomizer at the end of each month. One winner sill be selected each month to receive the free promotional item of the month. Winners will be announced on the first day of the following month.
The winners will be notified by email and will be asked to provide proof of age. The winner will have 3 days to provide that information. Failing to do so, may lead to disqualification.
Incorrect information provided may result in disqualification and anothe entrant will be selected at random.
All prizes must be accepted as awarded. Prizes are non-exchangeable, non-transferable, and are not redeemable for cash or other prizes.
Participation in the draw constitutes acceptance of, and compliance with, the draw rules.
Participants must be 18 or older and be able to verify age.
Please click here to see our privacy policy https://www.nakedsword.com/privacy
No additional purchase necessary, limited to U.S. residents only
